// src/App.js
import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{db}from'./firebase';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[projects,setProjects]=useState([]);const[newProject,setNewProject]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{const unsubscribe=db.collection('projects').onSnapshot(snapshot=>{const projectsData=snapshot.docs.map(doc=>({id:doc.id,...doc.data()}));setProjects(projectsData);});return()=>unsubscribe();},[]);const addProject=async()=>{if(newProject){await db.collection('projects').add({name:newProject});setNewProject('');}};const deleteProject=async id=>{await db.collection('projects').doc(id).delete();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:'20px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Project Manager"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:newProject,onChange:e=>setNewProject(e.target.value),placeholder:"Add new project"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:addProject,children:"Add Project"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:projects.map(project=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[project.name,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>deleteProject(project.id),children:"Delete"})]},project.id))})]});}export default App;
